rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entryway designed with Art Deco accents and Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow. It incorporates a small waiting area with decorative elements.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An expansive living room featuring rich textures, geometric patterns, and elegant furniture consistent with Art Deco style. Large windows and natural light to promote Vastu-friendly energy distribution.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A designated dining space adjacent to the living room, offering a functional yet stylish area for family meals with integrated Art Deco fixtures.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen layout with streamlined appliances and storage, designed in an Art Deco style that respects Vastu principles by situating the entrance facing east.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: An auxiliary toilet for guests, strategically placed to align with building flow and Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: A service space that includes storage and utility access, integrated seamlessly into the floor plan without disrupting aesthetic integrity.
